### getPrefixEncodingFromUnsigned() {#a3b7e579d8a9b891cdd4642852930d800}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="static unsigned getPrefixEncodingFromUnsigned (unsigned U)"
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
With a given unsigned int <code>U</code>, use up to 13 bits to represent it.

old&#95;bit 1~5 --&gt; new&#95;bit 1~5 old&#95;bit 6~12 --&gt; new&#95;bit 7~13 new&#95;bit&#95;6 is 0 if higher bits (7~13) are all 0

Definition at line <a href="#l00024">24</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/discriminator-h">Discriminator.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// discriminators.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number of discriminaitor bits, i.e.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BaseDiscriminatorBitWidth</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  + FSDiscriminatorBitWidth &#42; getNumFSPasses()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// needs to fit in an unsigned int type.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set bits in range of &#91;0 .. n&#93; to 1 Used in FS Discriminators.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa860d116fc20fde892f7485b706f9139"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa860d116fc20fde892f7485b706f9139">getN1Bits</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Work around the g++ bug that folding &quot;(1U &lt;&lt; (N + 1)) - 1&quot; to 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> == 31)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0xFFFFFFFF;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> &lt; 32) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;N is invalid&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (1U &lt;&lt; (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> + 1)) - 1;</span></CodeLine>
